comments.body: This is new.. I realize this is only a test, but is an init function the best way to handle this?

we already have this pattern @cblecker : 
https://cs.k8s.io/?q=logtostderr.*true&i=nope&files=%5E.*%5C_test%5C.go&repos=kubernetes/kubernetes

Currently the integration test fails (even before this PR i think), this one for the record:
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/cluster/images/etcd/Makefile#L177-L178

I need to decide what do to here. This is a near copy of the code under `staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/options/service_testing.go`. The only difference is that `x509.ExtKeyUsageClientAuth` is set.  I wanted to avoid checking in certs and keys to git (both because they can expire and then need to be regenerated, and also because their presence in source control can raise security concerns) so instead we're generating test certs and keys here.
